Class PlayerGUI

java.lang.Object
PlayerGUI
public class PlayerGUI
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a player GUI for a player. Contains various functions to display input options as well as a player window
Version:
May 26, 2021
Author:
rohit

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PlayerGUI​(java.lang.String playerName)
    Create a new PlayerGUI object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addMessage​(java.lang.String message)
    Adds message to the player window.
    int displayDropDown​(java.lang.String[] choices, java.lang.String message)
    Displays drop down with options for a player.
    int displayNumerical​(java.lang.String message)
    Display a numerical input option.
    void reset()
    Resets the GUI by removing all extraneous windows.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public int displayDropDown​(java.lang.String[] choices, java.lang.String message)
      Displays drop down with options for a player.
      Parameters:
      choices - choices to display
      message - message to show with dropdown
      Returns:
      index of choice that was selected

    • displayNumerical

      public int displayNumerical​(java.lang.String message)
      Display a numerical input option.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Resets the GUI by removing all extraneous windows.
